fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"//alert(\\"first\\");\\nguideBridge.getDataXML({\\n success : function (guideResultObject) {\\n console.log(\\"xml data received\\" + guideResultObject.data);\\n formdataXML.value = guideResultObject.data;\\n }\,\\n error : function (guideResultObject) {\\n console.error(\\"API Failed\\");\\n var msg = guideResultObject.getNextMessage();\\n while (msg !== null) {\\n console.error(msg.message);\\n msg = guideResultObject.getNextMessage();\\n }\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.Submit"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true},{"script":{"content":" //alert(\\"second\\");\\nvar url = \\"http://localhost:8080/rest/services/Caltrans-eADR/Processes/SubmitCopy:1.0\\";\\nvar formdata = formdataXML.value;\\nvar parser = new DOMParser();\\nxmlDoc = parser.parseFromString(formdata\,\\"text/xml\\");\\nvar xmldata=xmlDoc.getElementsByTagName(\\"afUnboundData\\")[0].innerHTML;\\nconsole.log(xmldata);\\n//console.log(JSON.stringify(xmlToJson.parse( xmldata ).data));\\n//var subdata=JSON.stringify(xmlToJson.parse( xmldata ).data);\\n \\t/*$.ajax({ \\n type: 'POST'\,\\n headers: {\\n \\t'Content-type' : 'application/xml'\,*/\\n // 'Accept' : '*/*'\\n \\t\\t/* }\,\\n url: url\,\\n data: xmldata\,\\n success: function (data) { \\n alert(\\"Submitted\\");\\n }\,\\n error: function(err){\\n //this block is executed when server encounters any problem\\n alert(\\"something went wrong\\");\\n }\\n });*/\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.Submit"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
